profilesPage.title: Profiles Management
profilesPage.createModalDescription: Fill in the details below to add a new bidding profile.
profilesPage.editModalDescription: Update the details for this profile.
profilesPage.deleteAlertDescription: Are you sure you want to delete profile "{{profileName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
profilesPage.tableCaption: A list of your configured profiles.
profilesPage.noProfilesFound: No profiles found. Get started by creating one!

profileForm.nameDescription: A descriptive name for this profile.
profileForm.typeDescription: Choose "personal" for individual accounts, "agency" for teams.
profileForm.autobidDescription: Allow automatic bidding for jobs matching this profile.
